description:
**Problem**
Minor suggestions from CRDT review that were deferred.

**Design**
1. **Normalize on parse** - Add prune_dominated()/normalization after OrSet::from_parts() in git/wire.rs and WAL
2. **Remove unused variant** - Delete EventValidationError::TooManyLabels if unused
3. **join() error handling** - Either return Self directly or actually collect errors instead of expect()

**Acceptance**
- [ ] prune_dominated() called after OrSet::from_parts()
- [ ] TooManyLabels variant removed if unused
- [ ] join() error handling cleaned up
- [ ] All tests pass
title: CRDT minor suggestions from review
